text: cng klaw theid (muhammad) wa xo phu thi di rab khamphir thanghlay pheraa hetu dı than cung khadkhwang phu sraththa sung thang khx ngxallxhˌ doythi phwk than prarthna ca hı thang khx ngxallxhˌ khd thang «thi phwk than k pen phyan yunyan xyu læa xallxhˌ nan michı pen phuthrng phelx nı sing thi phwk than kratha kan
